addBuilding(Player, BoardArea) - Method in class gameplay.Game
 
addBuildingForPlayer(Player) - Method in class gameplay.BoardArea
Adds a building to this board area for the given player.
Note that a building cannot be added to an area that contains a trouble marker or already contains a building.
addCard(GreenPlayerCard) - Method in class card.player.DiscardPile
 
addCityCard(AnkhMorporkArea) - Method in class gameplay.Player
Adds the city area card corresponding to the given area to the player's hand.
addDemon() - Method in class gameplay.BoardArea
Increments the number of demons on the area.
Demons are regarded as minions so they will affect trouble in the area.
addInterrupt(GreenPlayerCard, Player) - Method in class gameplay.Game
 
addMinion(Player) - Method in class gameplay.BoardArea
This method adds the minion of the player in the city area, and justifies the balance of stocked minions.
addMinion(int, Player) - Method in class gameplay.Game
Adds a minion for the given player in the area with the given area code.
addPlayerCard(Player, int) - Method in class gameplay.Game
Draws player cards.
Adds the given player's hand size (i) if it is less than five.
If no more player cards are available, the player's hand is left as it is at the time when the cards are up (the game should end after the player's turn is finished).
addPlayerCard(Player, GreenPlayerCard) - Method in class gameplay.Game
 
addPlayerCard(Player) - Method in class gameplay.Game
 
addPlayerCard(GreenPlayerCard) - Method in class gameplay.Player
This method adds player's cards one by one.
addTroll() - Method in class gameplay.BoardArea
Increments the number of trolls on the area.
Trolls are regarded as minions so they will affect trouble in the area.
addTroubleMarker() - Method in class gameplay.BoardArea
Adds trouble markers to the city area in case there were not any before.
addTroubleMarker(int) - Method in class gameplay.Game
Add a trouble marker to the area with the given ID.
addUnplayableCard(GreenPlayerCard) - Method in class gameplay.Player
 
advanceToNextTurn() - Method in class gameplay.Controller
Advances the turn to the next player and returns the player whose turn it currently is.
advanceTurnToNextPlayer() - Method in class gameplay.Game
Moves the game forward by one turn and returns the player whose turn it currently is.
amountBoundryCheck() - Method in class gameplay.PlayerTest
